metadata.title: CVE-2023-31436 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
qfq_change_class in net/sched/sch_qfq.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.13allows an out-of-bounds write because lmax can exceed QFQ_MIN_LMAX.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-73-generic - 5.15.0-73.80
linux-image-5.15.0-73-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-73.80
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-73-generic - 5.15.0-73.80
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-73-generic-64k - 5.15.0-73.80
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-43-generic - 5.19.0-43.44~22.04.1
linux-image-5.19.0-43-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-43.44~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-43-generic - 5.19.0-43.44~22.04.1

No subscription required
